io.spine.server.command

Class DispatchCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.command.DispatchCommand

  • @Internal
public final class DispatchCommand
extends java.lang.Object
    A command dispatch operation.

    Dispatches the given command to the given entity and triggers the EntityLifecycle.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static DispatchCommand operationFor(EntityLifecycle lifecycle, CommandHandlingEntity<?,?,?> entity, io.spine.core.CommandEnvelope command) 
      java.util.List<io.spine.core.Event> perform()

    • Method Detail

      • operationFor

        public static DispatchCommand operationFor(EntityLifecycle lifecycle,
                                           CommandHandlingEntity<?,?,?> entity,
                                           io.spine.core.CommandEnvelope command)

      • perform

        public java.util.List<io.spine.core.Event> perform()
        Performs the operation.

        First, the EntityLifecycle.onDispatchCommand(Command) callback is triggered.

        Then, the command is passed to the entity.

        Lastly, depending on the command handling result, either EntityLifecycle.onCommandHandled(...) or EntityLifecycle.onCommandRejected(...) callback is triggered.

        Returns:
        the produced events including the rejections thrown by the command handler
